Package curam.util.persistence

Contains the underlying infrastructure classes for mapping objects to and from a relational database.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ContextContainer A Context Container for adding and retrieving context objects to be associated with Entities.
CreatorDAO<ID,ENTITY extends Entity<ID>> An interface for creating new instances of a logical entity, suitable for inserting onto the physical database.
Entity<ID> A logical entity which stores its data on one (or, sometimes, more) physical database table(s).
EntityAdapter<ID,DTLS_STRUCT> Standardizes the names of basic database operations.
EntityInfoSetter<I,E extends Entity<I>,S extends DeepCloneable> Allows the setting of a EntityInfo object.
Insertable Instances of this interface may be inserted onto the database.
Modifiable Instances of this interface may be modified on the database.
OptimisticLockable Indicates that the logical entity has optimistic support.
OptimisticLockModifiable Instances of this interface may be modified on the database.
OptimisticLockRemovable Instances of this interface may be removed from the database.
ReaderDAO<ID,ENTITY extends Entity<ID>> An interface for creating an in-memory representation of an entity instance which already exists on the physical database.
Removable Instances of this interface may be removed from the database.
StandardDAO<ENTITY extends StandardEntity> A standard interface for creating new instances of logical entities which have long integer identifiers.
StandardEntity A logical entity which uses a long integer as its identifier.
Validator Standard validation and specification of default values.
 

Class Summary
BaseDAOImpl<I,E extends Entity<I>,S extends DeepCloneable> Base class for DAO implementations for abstract base classes.
ConcreteDAOImpl<I,E extends Entity<I>,S extends DeepCloneable> Base class for DAO implementations.
ContextContainerImpl Default implementation of ContextContainerImpl
Usage Note: This class is should not be extended by external parties (e.g.
DAOImpl<I,E extends Entity<I>,S extends DeepCloneable> Base class for DAO implementations for abstract base classes.
DAOReadmultiOperation<E extends Entity<?>> A Curam "readmulti" operation is one which retrieves multiple rows from the application database.
EntityInfo<I,E extends Entity<I>,S extends DeepCloneable> An immutable convenience object which contains all the information for managing an instance of a logical entity.
GuiceWrapper Wraps our dependency injector (Guice).
GuiceWrapper.InitializationEvents.DefaultListener A do-nothing implementation of GuiceWrapper.InitializationEvents.
Module Module for the guice bindings for the persistence infrastructure.
PersistenceEvent<E extends Entity<?>> Abstract class that Persistence event handlers should implement.
RowInfo<I,S> An immutable convenience object which contains all the information for managing a row of data associated with a physical database table.
RowManager<I,S extends DeepCloneable> Manages a row of data for a physical database table.
StandardDAOImpl<E extends StandardEntity,S extends DeepCloneable> Base class for DAO implementations of standard entities.
TransactionHelper A helper class which provides services to entities in a transaction.
ValidationHelper Helps the server application accumulate validation errors.
 

Enum Summary
GuiceWrapper.Status The status of the Guice Wrapper initialization.
 

Annotation Types Summary
TransactionScope TODO: JavaDoc.
 

Package curam.util.persistence Description

Contains the underlying infrastructure classes for mapping objects to and from a relational database.
